TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWebProxy

summary.span: 提供基接口以实现对 类的代理访问。

span.span: Provides the base interface for implementation of proxy access for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口提供的方法和属性所需的类以访问代理服务器。The interface provides the methods and properties that are required by the class to access proxy servers. 类是的基实现接口。The class is the base implementation of the interface.

para.span: 方法可以用于控制代理使用基于目标 URI。

span.span: The method can be used to control proxy use based on the destination URI.

para.span: 使用方法，以指示，应不使用代理用于访问目标服务器。

span.span: Use the method to indicate that the proxy should not be used to reach the destination server.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::ICredentials ^ Credentials { System::Net::ICredentials ^ get(); void set(System::Net::ICredentials ^ value); };

summary.span: 要提交给代理服务器进行身份验证的凭据。

span.span: The credentials to submit to the proxy server for authentication.

value.span: 实例，它包含对代理服务器请求进行身份验证所需的凭据。

span.span: An instance that contains the credentials that are needed to authenticate a request to the proxy server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是实例，其中包含要发送到为 HTTP 407 （代理授权） 状态代码的响应中的代理服务器的授权凭据。The property is an instance that contains the authorization credentials to send to the proxy server in response to an HTTP 407 (proxy authorization) status code. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性将会提交的凭据设置为身份验证的代理服务器。The following example uses the property to set the credentials that will be submitted to the proxy server for authentication. [!code-cpp[IWebProxy_Interface#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/CPP/iwebproxy_interface.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IWebProxy_Interface#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/CS/iwebproxy_interface.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IWebProxy_Interface#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/VB/iwebproxy_interface.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Uri GetProxy(class System.Uri destination) cil managed
Public Function GetProxy (destination As Uri) As Uri

span.span: A that specifies the requested Internet resource.
Returns the URI of a proxy.

returns.span: 实例，它包含用于与 联系的代理的 URI。

span.span: A instance that contains the URI of the proxy used to contact .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回的代理服务器的处理请求中指定的 Internet 资源的 URI`destination`参数。The method returns the URI of the proxy server that handles requests to the Internet resource that is specified in the `destination` parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法返回的 URI，用于访问 Internet 资源。The following example uses the method to return the URI that the uses to access the Internet resource. [!code-cpp[IWebProxy_Interface#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/CPP/iwebproxy_interface.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[IWebProxy_Interface#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/CS/iwebproxy_interface.cs#4)] [!code-vb[IWebProxy_Interface#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/VB/iwebproxy_interface.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsBypassed(class System.Uri host) cil managed
Public Function IsBypassed (host As Uri) As Boolean

param.name: host
param.span: 要检查代理使用情况的主机的 。

span.span: The of the host to check for proxy use.

summary.span: 指示代理不应用于指定的主机。

span.span: Indicates that the proxy should not be used for the specified host.

returns.span: 如果代理服务器不应用于 ，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the proxy server should not be used for ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法指示是否使用代理服务器来访问中指定的主机`host`参数。The method indicates whether to use the proxy server to access the host that is specified in the `host` parameter. 如果是`true`、 不使用的代理联系主机和请求直接传递到服务器。If is `true`, the proxy is not used to contact the host and the request is passed directly to the server. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性来确定是否应为指定的主机使用的代理服务器。The following example uses the property to determine whether the proxy server should be used for the specified host. [!code-cpp[IWebProxy_Interface#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/CPP/iwebproxy_interface.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[IWebProxy_Interface#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/CS/iwebproxy_interface.cs#4)] [!code-vb[IWebProxy_Interface#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/VB/iwebproxy_interface.vb#4)]
